pullRequest.title: LR Fix Timeout Exceptions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Overview
Description:
Catch TimeoutExceptions correctly as these are wrapped by the CompletableFuture in an ExecutionException.
Why should this be merged: functional bug
Checklist (Definition of Done):

 There are no TODOs left in the code
 Coding conventions (e.g. for logging, unit tests) have been followed
 Change is covered by automated tests
 Public API has Javadoc

nodes.bodyText:
I think we still need the catch block for TimeoutException.
There are two kinds of TimeoutException:

From the actual sendMsg's CF, this type will be wrapped with the ExecutionException 
From anyOf(cfs).get(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)

afterCommit.message:
Fix ACK TimeoutException Handling

- TimeoutException's are attempted to be caught, while they're always wrapped around an ExecutionException.
